org.openlcb.implementations

Class BitProducerConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.AbstractConnection
      • org.openlcb.MessageDecoder
        • org.openlcb.implementations.BitProducerConsumer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connection

    public class BitProducerConsumer
extends MessageDecoder
    Maintains a bit represented by two event IDs: one off, one on.

    Created by bracz on 1/6/16.
